abstract: The Fox Business Network is said to be in talks to hire CNBC’s Charlie Gasparino, the longtime financial reporter.
snippet: The Fox Business Network is said to be in talks to hire CNBC’s Charlie Gasparino, the longtime financial reporter.
lead_paragraph: Update: 4:45 p.m.: The Fox Business Network confirmed Tuesday that it had hired Charlie Gasparino, the CNBC financial reporter.

headline.main: Fox Business in Talks With Gasparino
